corpses.name: Giant Rat Corpse
corpses.description: The corpse of an oversized rodent. Its meat might be edible if prepared properly.

corpses.name: Goblin Corpse
corpses.description: The remains of a vicious humanoid. Surprisingly, its meat is considered a delicacy in some circles.

corpses.name: Giant Bat Corpse
corpses.description: The corpse of a large bat. Its leathery wings contain surprising nutrients.

corpses.name: Jackal Corpse
corpses.description: The corpse of a scavenging canine. Pack hunters make for lean meat.

corpses.name: Kobold Corpse
corpses.description: The corpse of a reptilian humanoid. Its scales require careful removal.

corpses.name: Newt Corpse
corpses.description: The tiny corpse of an amphibian. Its regenerative properties are legendary.

corpses.name: Grid Bug Corpse
corpses.description: The corpse of an electric insect. Still crackling with residual energy.

corpses.name: Hobgoblin Corpse
corpses.description: The corpse of a disciplined warrior. Its meat is tougher but more nutritious than goblin.

corpses.name: Orc Corpse
corpses.description: The corpse of a brutish warrior. Its meat pulses with residual rage.

corpses.name: Zombie Corpse
corpses.description: The twice-dead remains of a zombie. Paradoxically, the flesh is well-preserved by dark magic.

corpses.name: Floating Eye Corpse
corpses.description: The corpse of a bizarre aberration. Its ocular fluid has unusual properties.

corpses.name: Acid Blob Residue
corpses.description: The remains of an acid blob. Requires careful neutralization to be safe.

corpses.name: Giant Ant Corpse
corpses.description: The corpse of a worker ant. Its chitinous body contains concentrated nutrients.

corpses.name: Dwarf Corpse
corpses.description: The corpse of a mountain dweller. Their diet of mushrooms and minerals creates unique flavors.

corpses.name: Gnome Corpse
corpses.description: The corpse of a small tinkerer. Infused with traces of illusory magic.
